about_the_game:
*Includes a horizontal side scrolling mode with a single-player story, and 5 well-designed areas that can be raided.
* Two playable characters with unique styles.
* Thirty skill programs and 80 props plug-ins ensure high replay value as much as possible.
* Game mechanics worthy of repeated challenges, using combos and proficiency to gain more resources.
* Repeatedly polished combat feel.
* "Enhanced" difficulty specially prepared for action game lovers.
detailed_description:
*Includes a horizontal side scrolling mode with a single-player story, and 5 well-designed areas that can be raided.
* Two playable characters with unique styles.
* Thirty skill programs and 80 props plug-ins ensure high replay value as much as possible.
* Game mechanics worthy of repeated challenges, using combos and proficiency to gain more resources.
* Repeatedly polished combat feel.
* "Enhanced" difficulty specially prepared for action game lovers.
name: 行星记忆 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A 2.5D scrolling Beat them up game. The combination of classical hardcore and modern pop, free combination of various skill programs and props plug-ins. Support Online Multyplayer, experience the innovative mode of "cooperation and competition".
